metadata.feature_description: Provides hierarchical folder tree navigation with expand/collapse functionality and path breadcrumbs

steps.action: Navigate to Assets module and view root folder content
steps.expected: Root folder content should display with folder cards
steps.actual: Root folder displayed showing folders: Badges, Groups, Images, PermissionsTestFolder, SecureFolderTest, Templates, Users, WorkflowTestFolder and files

steps.action: Click on 'Images' folder to expand/navigate into it
steps.expected: Should navigate into Images folder showing its contents
steps.actual: Successfully navigated into Images folder, showing subfolders (MoveTestFolder, Publisher, SecureFolderTest2026, TestNewFolder2026) and files (CTA-1.jpg through CTA-8.jpg, etc.)

steps.action: Navigate deeper into Publisher subfolder within Images
steps.expected: Should show 3-level deep navigation (Home > Images > Publisher)
steps.actual: Successfully navigated 3 levels deep. Breadcrumb shows HOME > IMAGES > PUBLISHER. Publisher folder contents displayed with various image files

steps.action: Click 'IMAGES' in the breadcrumb while at Publisher folder
steps.expected: Should navigate back one level to Images folder
steps.actual: Successfully navigated back to Images folder. Breadcrumb updated to HOME > IMAGES, showing Images folder contents

steps.action: Click 'HOME' in the breadcrumb to return to root
steps.actual: Successfully navigated to root folder. Breadcrumb shows HOME only, displaying all root folders

steps.action: Change sort order from 'Alphabetical' to 'Last Modified'
steps.expected: Folder order should change based on last modified date
steps.actual: Successfully changed sort to 'Last Modified'. Folder order changed from alphabetical (Badges, Groups, Images...) to modification order (Templates, PermissionsTestFolder, Groups, ThisIsAVeryLong..., Badges, Users, Images, WorkflowTestFolder...)

steps.action: Navigate into PermissionsTestFolder which is empty
steps.actual: Successfully navigated to empty folder. UI displays 'This Folder is Empty' message with instruction to use tools above to add an asset or create a folder

steps.action: Hover over folder to view action icons for permissions access
steps.expected: Action icons (edit, move, delete) should appear on hover
steps.actual: Action icons appeared when hovering over the Images folder card, showing edit pencil, move arrow, and delete trash icons on the right side of the selected card

observations: Code confirms folder permissions are displayed through GetFolderDetails API endpoint (AssetsController.cs line 548-574) which returns permissions data including role and user permissions
The buildPermissionGrid function in Assets.js (line 911-942) creates a permissions grid UI when viewing folder details
Action icons on folder cards appear on hover/selection but accessing them programmatically was challenging due to their dynamic/CSS-driven rendering
The folder tree supports 3 sort options: Last Modified, Date Uploaded, and Alphabetical (default)
Breadcrumb navigation provides visual path and clickable links for quick navigation to any parent folder
Empty folders display a helpful message encouraging users to add content
Long folder names are truncated with ellipsis in the UI but full names are accessible
Secure folders show a lock icon indicator on the folder card
